alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 1:26PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Palm Beach County through 200 PM EDT... At 126 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Lion Country Safari Park, or 12 miles southeast of Belle Glade, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Boynton Beach, Delray Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Loxahatchee NWR, Golden Lakes, Kings Point, North County Airport, Dunes Road, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, The Acreage, Village Of Golf, Aberdeen, Aberdeen Golf Course, Florida Gardens and Villages Of Oriole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
